title: Table
text:
Size and position

Use CSS grid to adjust the width and position the table.
The tbl-colwidths option adds up to 12.

Use : to align.

title: MyQuartoDoc
text: This is a Quarto website to collect commonly used features to write technical report.

title: CSS
text:
Copy

style.css
theme.scss

from Quarto to project directory, and add the following to _quarto.yml.
format:
  html:
    theme:
      light: [cosmo, theme.scss]
    css: styles.css

title: CSS
text:

style.css
theme.scss

from Quarto to project directory, and add the following to _quarto.yml.
format:

      light: [cosmo, theme.scss]
    css: styles.css

title: Figure
Figure
Figure
Figure
text:
Configuration

Listing 1: Move figure caption to the top in _quarto.yml
format:
  html:
    fig-cap-location: top

title: Figure
text:
Cross reference
This section is purposely placed at the end, in order to see the effect of cross reference to figures.
[Go to Julia Logo](#fig-julia_logo_local) or @fig-julia_logo_local
Go to Julia Logo or Figure 1
